author: ワラソティス
text:
るしあちゃん画伯過ぎて終始爆笑してたｗるしあちゃんの絵は優しいタッチで見てて癒やされる！
自分の絵が売れたときの嬉しそうにはしゃいでて可愛かった！流石美術９

author: AHYAI
text:
るーちゃんとお絵描きしたのが楽しかったので見に来ました！
るーちゃんの概念を絵にするコーナーが特に良かった…
めちゃくちゃ可愛いんだけど、可愛さの中に時々ふっと見せるダークな部分がるーちゃんが実は思慮深い人物だって物語っていてすごく落ち着いた女性を感じられて好き…(∩˘ω˘∩ )♡
この頃のふぁんでっどちゃん達も、るーちゃんが何も言わなくてもいつもと違うって時は分かってたんだね…
僕はみんなに心配をかけないようにしてくれてるるーちゃんが大好きだし尊敬してるし、るーちゃんが自分から言わない時は何も聞かずにそっと寄り添ってあげたいなあって思いました。

author: ぼぼらぶ
text:
るしあは凄い、天才だ！
"希望"と言う題名の絵はまさに碇ユイとシンジとATフィールドの関係性をあらわしていると思う。
ユイのATフィールドに希望であるシンジを迎え入れ守ってあげようとしている様に見える。
るしあは本物の初号機か？

author: Hito Kikoeru
text:
45:00
I started to worry about rushia
We forgot sometimes that she's a normal girl. She feels anxious here and there. And I'm this chance she let us know what is she feeling through her tone as a vtuber or an idol by drawing her anxiety.

I love you rushia not only as a rushia but the person behind it.

Jinsei Ganbare rushia
Ganbarenai kutemo mo daijoubu

author: Amai Ta. Yume
text: KonRushi! Thank you for the stream! I'm glad to know your art is better than mine. And the concepts that you drew in abstract was seriously nostalgic of my young days. I applaud you for that! Thank you EN and JP bros again for the support! Take Care and Have a nice day/night!

author: Luqman
text: I need translator-kun....

author: Jake Kamiya
text: 1:26start

author: Nexcell Pride
text:
Wonderful stream... :_ハート: :_ちょうちょ:

This time is about "Passepartout", a painting art simulation game...
Also has a goal: generating Profits at painting.

Ooowww... I envy Rushia a lot, she's a better painting artist than me, but at the same time I thank her for the inspiration. :_きゅん:
Let's see... I'm also drawing at my group" Kousei no Onpu" since October, but the girls there urge me not to continue to avoid overloading myself. At same time, a friend at group draws very well.

And returning to game... I love this... And this would have a Part Deux or sequels. :_ハート:

1:02:30 Cute laughter... :_るんるん:

1:05:00 Rushia went Angry :_おこおこ: and at 1:05:17 started to cry :_しょぼん:  about a black background art...

At 1:11:27, heart is drawn... And LiveChat had a Heart Tsunami. :_ハート:

And the last art... The Holofantasy... I loved it. 

This stream had a lot of emotions, but after all was a great delivery. :_ちょうちょ:
